T

Thread1 - Class in at.uibk.ac.at.Task1.cancellation_threads
Generates random integer values from 0 to 41
Cancellation via cancel()
When canceled POIION_PILL is produced
Thread1(BlockingQueue<Integer>) - Constructor for class at.uibk.ac.at.Task1.cancellation_threads.Thread1
 
Thread2 - Class in at.uibk.ac.at.Task1.cancellation_threads
Consumes values from the in and forwards even values to out
Stops when POIION_PILL is consumed
Thread2(BlockingQueue<Integer>, BlockingQueue<Integer>) - Constructor for class at.uibk.ac.at.Task1.cancellation_threads.Thread2
 
Thread3 - Class in at.uibk.ac.at.Task1.cancellation_threads
Consumes values from the in
Sets up a ServerSocket at port,
consumed values are written to the socket Cancellation via cancel()
Thread3(BlockingQueue<Integer>, int) - Constructor for class at.uibk.ac.at.Task1.cancellation_threads.Thread3
 
Thread4 - Class in at.uibk.ac.at.Task1.cancellation_threads
Connects to a SocketServer at port and consumes data
Cancellation via interrupt
Interrupt is restored when run is called directly
Thread4(int) - Constructor for class at.uibk.ac.at.Task1.cancellation_threads.Thread4
